revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_SigilCharge'''
(''no parameter'')
Plays the sound "weapons/sigilcharge" on the Weapons channel and then calls [[A_Light2]]. A shortcut for the following: SIGH A 0 Bright [[A_PlaySound]] ("weapons/sigilcharge", CHAN_WEAPON) SIGH A 18 Bright [[A_Light2]] This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
